website_summaries.verdict: With exceptional flavor, scent, and processing, this brand earned its place at the top of our short list.
pros: A popular brand that has all the features consumers love in pure, unrefined coconut oil
Smooth texture and pleasant taste and aroma
cons: With only 16 ounces in the jar, it's more costly than other brands we tested, but the quality justifies the price

customer_reviews.title: NOT Actually Certified USDA Organic!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's claimed that this product is USDA organic, but there is no Viva Naturals brand in the USDA organic integrity database. I've had no problem finding any of the other brands that I use within the database. I will not repurchase and I will not buy anything else from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: This oil is at best can be used as a body moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have used home made coconut oil and I can say for sure that this product does not work as a pure coconut oil. Pure cocunut oil when applied to hair, will add volume, remove frizziness and will not have a very light feeling on hairs. Viva coconut oil does not do anything close to it. It did not work for me and neither for my daughter. This oil is at best can be used as a body moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Rupam Dutta

customer_reviews.title: Whoa!! Now THIS is coconut oil!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe the reviews on this product so I figured I'd see what all the fuss is about. But when I opened this tub, OH MY. That coconut smell made me want a pastry stat! It's a little grittier than the lesser quality coconut oils but it does dissolve. I use this to moisturize after showers but will eventually try it with cooking. Other brands I've tried have left me waking up in the mornings with dry, chalky skin and wondering what's so great about coconut oil if it doesn't keep me moisturized through the night? But not this brand. Oh, and the price isn't too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: No seal, lots of ants
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a few days ago and it arrived today. It was late at night when I got home, picked up the box from the front door, and went to the counter to open the box. A swarm of ants and other creepy crawlers came out of the box. There wasn’t a seal, the oil leaked quite a bit and there are still some ants crawling out my house.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best hair conditioner & it smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as a conditioner for my hair. Best conditioner ever and it smells so good! To see the consistency, how you need to melt it in the palm of your hands before applying, etc., please take a look at my video on YouTube, "HOW TO: Create Shiny, Healthy-Looking, Beautiful Hair" on Shawna Who. I apply this all over my hair the day/night before I need to wash and it leaves my hair feeling soft and looking shiny. Coconut fabulousness!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna WhoTop Contributor: Hair Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Viva Natural not high quality for wounds.  Try Viva Labs
customer_reviews.text: Allergic. I can’t use VIVA NATURAL coconut oil. The word “VIVA” is written in large print on the front of the container. This is the first coconut oil I ordered. I used a little on my skin, but was careful not to put any on my wounds. I eventually threw the container away. I wanted a high quality oil for wound healing. So I ordered VIVA LAB coconut oil. A BLUE, ROUND LOGO is pictured on the front of Viva Lab’s container. But Amazon sent me Viva Natural brand by mistake, and don’t want it returned. So I’ll have to throw Viva Natural away, all 54 ounces of it!
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Titus, too
customer_reviews.text: Among tons of varied uses/benefits, this tasty and fresh product is given daily as a treat, to Titus - our Wonderdog. It met all Veteranary-suggested criteria... keep the following in mind when using to supplement your pets. 1. Organic and Certified 2. Extra Virgin 3. Cold Pressed 4. Doesn’t cost a fortune Small dogs can usually have a tsp or so daily. Larger dogs - more. Check with vet. Great as anti-inflammatory agent, helps digestion, builds healthy coats, can even moisturize dry and sore foot pads. And humans - research coconut oil for yourself. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: mE, yoU & TiTuS (♥️PluTo)

customer_reviews.title: Coconut Latte
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. At first I was nervous adding coconut oil to my diet. Even though I have heard coconut oil aids in weight loss, there's no denying it's very high in fat/calories. However, along with diet and exercise, I've still managed to lose five pounds in the last month! With that being said, I don't eat very much of it in a day. Here's how I use it (try it and you'll thank me) -2 tsp coconut oil -1 large cup of coffee -Splash of vanilla creamer Put it in the blender and you have a Starbucks quality latte. You're welcome!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since I reached out to the sellers with no response, warning otheres here...first container I had months ago, no issues...smooth whether it was cold or room temperature, did not matter. This second container is full of pieces of coconut....which would be fine except for the fact that I am paying for the oil, and not the coconut. I cannot cook anything with it unless I want coconut pieces in it, cannot rub it in my hair because of course...who wants chunks of coconut pieces in their hair that looks like really bad dandruff. Don't know what happened, but expected a response. I will not buy this a 3rd time!
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic999

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works great for all the things I use it for; cooking, personal care, etc. However the last two times I ordered this product it leaked out all over the box. I understand that coconut oil will melt when it gets warm but leaking out of the container during shipping means that the seal isn't on correctly. Too bad. Not sure how they can or will fix this problem so the product doesn't spoil or allow stuff to get inside while shipped form the Philippines and stored in the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: TNMom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product before and loved it. This time the texture is different and even worse, when I opened the container (which was hard as it felt like it had oil all over it) there was a huge hole down the center of the oil much like one of those big candles as they burn down. If melted there's probably less than half a container there. I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Prather

customer_reviews.title: Love the coconut oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love the coconut oil so far. The price is affordable compared to some of the other brands. There is a light coconutty scent that my 6 year old daughter and I love. I have been using the coconut oil on my growing belly to help minimize stretch marks throughout my pregnancy. I've also used it on my elbows, dry heels, and hands at night. I haven't used it for cooking or in my hair yet, that is yet to come. This was a good buy and I would recommend it if you are in the market for trying out coconut oil!
customer_reviews.author: .owl.123.

customer_reviews.title: Magical product
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product after only 3 days using it. For years I have been dealing with uncomfortable rashes around my bra line. My dermatologist prescribed different medications/creams which I could not use due to interactions with other medication I take. When I applied this oil I saw results the very first day. I still have some raised bumps but they are not angry red and do not itch. I have been applying this after my morning shower and again in the evening. So far the results have been amazing. Plus it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: lsb

customer_reviews.title: Ok. I’m a cleaning and beauty freak and this isn’t just for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Just as title says...this isn’t just for cooking. 1) husband uses as a face cream. He’s had terrible rosacea his whole life. Now? It’s gone. Very rarely does his rosacea return and when it does, it usually is when he stops using this! 2) ok. Weird use but gonna share. It’s great for calming hemorrhoids. 3). Used a light layer on leather furniture and purses. Just as good as Shea butter !!! (Be sure to test the leather to ensure it Is dyed to handle moisturizers) 4) great for applying to wood furniture w a dab of mayonnaise as well. Shine and shine and shine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Smell good, moiturizing the skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the coconut oil. One of my patients' mother introduce me to the coconut oil since I have sensitive skin after turning 30. I had struggled with so many cosmetic product to keep my facial skin moist, healthy, reduced pore and prevent aging signs. I face got redder. I have used the coconut oil for several nights and woke up with a moist looking skin. The coconut oil of the brand smell very very nice. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AN MY D NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Remover!
customer_reviews.text: Lately I’ve been trying to be more of a Frugal Fran! I bought this solely as makeup remover because I wear heavy waterproof foundation for oily skin. This stuff is great. I personally hate the smell because I don’t care for coconuts. But it’s so good for your skin. I did a lot of research on “natural makeup removers” and coconut oil was at the top of the list every time. I’m saving a significant amount of money with this stuff over wipes. Removing eye makeup is a little tricky tho. Ive gotten this in my eyes on several occasions and surprisingly it did not irritate them. And my eyes are pretty sensitive. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing. The doctors where offering me steroid creams for ...
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but i had to. If anyone has a child suffering from eczema pleaseeeee use this coconut oil. Its amazing. The doctors where offering me steroid creams for my 1 year old. I was like nooo there has to be a natural way. I turned to coconut oil and problem solved. This one i use now because i just love the smell and i feel it works better than most. Please use coconut oil or this one for you skin its has cleared my daughter 100%. I apply it in the bath at the end and just throw one coat of water and eczema gone.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this. No matter how many ways I tried to use it (skin, hair, etc) it didn't work. It actually made my hands drier than usual. I guess it's just not meant for me. My sister swears by it, so I don't know!
customer_reviews.author: Chimney161Top Contributor: Minecraft

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve used it for years. I use it as a moisturizer for my body. It keeps my arms, legs , hands and feet moisturized / especially in the winter. Because of it becomes liquid at 75 degrees- it melts into your skin and absorbs quickly. It doesn’t leave you greasy so it doesn’t mess up clothes Or bedding. Use it everyday before going to bed and bye bye dry sky and hello to soft moisturized skin. Especially elbows, & heels.
customer_reviews.author: TexasLady

customer_reviews.title: Coconut Oil is Nutritional
customer_reviews.text: I like my coconut oil. I am new to trying the Viva product line but I can say I like this oil . I just started using coconut oil ( going on 3 months now ) and I believe it is helping my skin condition. There are so many uses for coconut oil ( baking, hair, dry skin) that I am glad I found a product line I can trust. The debate about virgin oil verses oil that has been treated is worth noting. I have used both products and I prefer virgin oil but I can be comfortable with the treated oil. I highly recommend this product, I plan to buy more. Delivery was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: xiwaeo

customer_reviews.title: Best quality ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the smoothest and creamiest coconut oil I’ve ever used. I use it on my 1.5 year old daughter’s hair, face, skin, and diaper area (I don’t double dip and I don’t put it on her other areas after I put it on her diaper area). She loves to put it on her hands while I put it all over her. It’s not greasy or thin. Rubs in well and doesn’t feel oily or sticky. I’ll be buying only this from here on out. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Family

customer_reviews.title: It smells delicious and is very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for moisturizing my skin and hair and I also use it as a shaving cream. It smells very sweet and works best for me when I put it on my skin and hair while still wet. I am black with very tightly curled hair and this makes my hair soft without feeling too greasy (but I typically have VERY dry hair). I made a hair oil using this coconut oil, and essential oils of lavender, jasmine, vanilla, geranium (this is a flower) , neroli (this is a flower), patchouli and sandalwood. It smells delicious and makes my hair shine!
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin Pie 39

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it a little melted it’s fantastic but at room temp it’s pretty solid and takes some manipulating to get a good amount. But I’ve been using it for so many different purposes. My skin and hair, my cats skin and fur, etc. and it has been helping a lot !
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Great product, arrived liquidy.
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil works well. I use this for my skin and hair and it works just as any other quality coconut oil does. Unfortunately, it arrived completely melted and in a liquid form. It hasn’t fully hardened again since then. So while it is annoying to have to gunnel this into a bottle to make it easier to use, it works great! 5 stars for the products efficacy but 2 stars for the fact that it arrived completely melted.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Changed my dry skin and hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 8 months. I use it as an all over body moisturizer. I let a clump warm up and melt in my hands and pay close attention to elboes, feet etc. I use it on my face every few days and in my hair as a deep mousterizer for a coupke hours the shampoo. My skin has never been softer and my dry, curly hair feels great. I also had pilaris keratosis (plugged ducts on my arms) and it has smoothed them out. It should be white. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase, first time using coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: First time using coconut oil. Read some good things about it so chose this here. I consume about a large teaspoon every night, and apply it to my face and hands before bed. It's very greasy at first but soaks in surprisingly fast. I can't say I've noticed any difference in complexion or skin dryness (beyond the immediate), but it doesn't cause my face to breakout. Overall I am satisfied with it. It has a pleasant light smell of coconut that does not linger.
customer_reviews.author: SW Pa buyer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair nicely moisturized
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my hair and it keeps it great. It keeps my hair moisturized throughout which is the main reason I purchased it as my hair gets extremely dry. Don’t put to much though. A little bit does the great job
customer_reviews.author: Racxeel

customer_reviews.title: A Swiss Army Knife in a Bottle! Smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Coconut Oil is like a Swiss army knife. You can do soooooo many things with it! Need lotion? Check. Need to Moisturize? Check. Need some form of lubrication? Check. Need oil to cook? Check! 16 ounces of coconut oil is plenty for the price you're paying in my opinion. Viva Naturals really have some amazing products and I had no issue with it at all. Will be back! Flavor 5/5 *****. Moisturizing 5/5 *****. Item condition 5/5 *****. Packaging 5/5 *****. My Recommendation 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Greatest coconut oil I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this stuff for years. I use it for my hair and one container lasts me approximately 4 years! Recently we had a heat wave and I was getting ready to oil my hair and got this out and suddenly it's liquid! Not too surprising since it was 100 degrees out, but I was impressed by how perfectly crystal clear it was. I'd have thought it was water. Anyway, Considering how long I've used It I obviously swear by it. I use it about once every two weeks as a conditioner and keep it in overnight. I'll also use it after a swim in a pool if I didn't wear a cap.
customer_reviews.author: Ydain

customer_reviews.title: "Extra-Virign" Coconut Oil? Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a jar of coconut oil from this seller once before and had no problems. When I got the second order, the "extra-virgin" coconut oil inside was liquid. I at first thought it was because it had melted while in the mailing truck and left it to cool down, hoping it would solidify. Two days later and it's still a liquid. Here's why that's important: there are multiple sources that say authentic virgin coconut oil is a SOLID at room temperatures. I'm not sure what this oil is, but it ain't extra virgin.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so I finally broke down and decided to try out the whole coconut oil hype. I originally purchased it for my daughter's eczema (because I keep trying everything searching for a miracle). It truthfully did nothing for her eczema...but I love it for me. I use it for make-up remover (saw a You-Tube video) and it's amazing. I wear Urban Decay 24-7 eyeliners and their primer potion under my eyeshadow. Most makeup removers don't take it all off. This does! And no stinging eyes! I also use it as a moisturizer on my arms and love the smell. When it was delivered, it was in liquid/oil form. After about 2 days, it solidified again.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was good and the texture very good quality super pure too bad I was only able to used a little bit because who ever packed basically put it inside a plastic bag without and bubble wrap to protect the container from breaking and than the delivered person basically threw the container to the ground and ended up breaking the container causing it to basically leak everything on the plastic bag and stain my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for your hair care!
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair and use a cocktail of coconut oil and Argen oil every two weeks. This cocktail has a great smell and maintains the health and shine of my hair. Handling this coconut oil is very easy. Once applied completely, I leave my hair with it for twenty minutes and rinse completely. Very satisfied with the results. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Busybeeerc

customer_reviews.title: Gallstones remover
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil to remove Gallstones, I got Gallstones and have 2 friends had gallstones, they took 1 tbsp coconut oil mixed with 8 oz Apple juice every morning before any food, their stones gone after 1 month. I started May 25th hopefully mine are gone too in a month, I'll demand another ultrasound test next month to find out. if it works I'll start my own channel to let the whole world know. just you know this oil not only for beauty, it's also very healthy products to clean up your gut, do what I do even you don't have stones it will prevent stones formation.
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Product was not sealed properly!  Oil leaked EVERYWHERE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to having this product delivered today, which it was only to find it in the middle of my walk path. The box was completely saturated with coconut oil. Once the box was opened, the product continued to leak. The cap was not on properly and the inside piece of plastic to seal the oil was pulled open! ONE BIG MESS!
customer_reviews.author: A.Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great consistency, quality, and scent.  It's a very high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I researched a few companies before I decided to get this brand. I use this as a balm for my dog and know that it's safe to apply to his paws and nose if he ends up eating any of it. My puppy LOVES this and gets all excited when I apply this to his paws and the top of his nose. After a couple of hours, his paws that were rough is nice a soft and smells wonderful. The consistency is great and you know this good quality stuff that was made with great quality control. When I need to refill, I'll be looking to purchase this brand again. Very highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CitroeneR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to save on spending a lot on creams, lotions, serums. It moisturizes beautifully, stays on all day, and as a barrier works to protect me from the elements. I live in and travel a lot. Going from California to New York, traveling on plans, trains and in cars. My skin looks and feels great. (No telling how much pollution I pick up but at night I bathe and wash off all the crud I pick up traveling in the elements and then moisturize using this cream. Skin is severely dry so this has worked wonderfully to take care of me.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: NUTIVA BRAND IS BETTER! THIS STUFF IS LIQUID
customer_reviews.text: Ok so i need to come back and compare this coconut oil to the new i just revieved today! If you look at the pics you'll notice that THIS product after a week! Is FINALLY solid!!! Yay!!! HOWEVER! you'll also notice that this THIS product is more of a cloudy clearish look! The new NUTIVA product is solid WHITE! Havent been able to try the nutiva yet but i have a huge feeling that it is going to be way better than this VIVANATURALS brand! Just go ahead and get th NUTIVA! Save yourself some time and headache!
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL💋NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of my old coconut oil, and couldn't find the same in the store. This seemed like a much better deal, but I am just not feeling the same effects. I use coconut oil mostly as a moisturizer on my face. After using, my face still felt dry less than a half hour later, it is like it is not absorbing the oil. I did use on other parts of my body where I had eczema and it seemed to work well there.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coconut oil. I first started using it to cook with and then tasted it right out of the jar. I did not like the texture out of the jar but found that is was good for candida overgrowth so I kept eating about a tsp full per day. Now I eat up to 4 Tablespoons of it and I really love it. Just the right flavor and does not make eggs or other food taste like coconut like some that I have bought. I have tried at least 6 different brands and this is the one I keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: CFlaw3

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose wonder treatment!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this coconut oil for post radiation treatment on my skin and it’s amazing. It’s also wonderful for sunburns, rashes, infections, psoriasis, hair mask treatments, basically this stuff is amazing. This was my first time ordering from this vendor and using this particular brand, but I loved the consistency and that it was “granular-free”. Very soft and silky to the touch, spreads evenly and easily. Highly recommend, especially for those undergoing Cancer radiation treatments!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the hair soft
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my hair nice and soft. I massage into my scalp 1 hour before shampooing. Keeps my hair nice and soft. It has that strong coconut scent.
customer_reviews.author: Panter

customer_reviews.title: Natural, less harsh moisturizer for hair
customer_reviews.text: I had a hair loss problem and was hesitant to use conditioner. Given some recommendations from friends, I started using coconut oil instead. I spread it on my hair and leave it there for a couple hours before shampooing. I started to notice an improvement and my hair is not dry even without conditioner. The texture varies as the temperature changes. I didn't find that as an issue. Even when it's solid, after rubbing it a bit between my hands, it's ready to go. I'll be purchasing again after using up the current container.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Le

customer_reviews.title: Do not use for consumption! Especially if you have digestive problems.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pure crap! Not too many people use it for digestive problems but I did. I ate some at 2 different times and was very sick both times. I only ate it a 2nd time as a process of elimination to figure out what truly made me sick the 1st time. Mine smelled ok so I didn't hesitate the 1st time. I wish I hadn't tried it a 2nd now. I had my suspensions and now I'm certain that most of these containers are crap, this product is not for consumption and I would never try this brand again after truly reading all of the 1 star reviews. I hope to find a good brand that actual works
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Treats my sons eczema!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended I try coconut oil for my son’s eczema and as it turns out, coconut oil works great! It does have a strong coconut smell but it glides smoothly on his skin and has really helped treat and moisturize his dry and itchy skin. I took a photo of the container next to a standard roll of paper towels just to provide a better representation of the product size. Ours lasted a little over a year. We have been really happy with it and would confidently recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: not sure how it tastes???? but that was part of the review
customer_reviews.text: this stuff works really well. i put it on at night and slept in it - i put a cloth on my head. in the morning my hair was shiny. i am a white 52 year old female with spikey hair. i relaxed my hair to get it straighter and dried it out. after using thie product overnight, i was able to just shake my hair out and it spiked and looks super shiny and was super straight and soft. ill wash it out tonight but i may just start using this instead of gel etc
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: My sister recently had a reverse shoulder operation and it was recommended that she use Coconut oil on her scar. Last week she was given the ok to apply the oil to her scar. When she opened the bottle it was not sealed. the top foil paper seal was ripped open. Due to movement of the product she could not tell if it was tampered with or not. When shipping these items the seal should be checked. I know we are beyond the return date and we must take the lost, however, we never thought it would take so long to be able to use the product. Thank you for your time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: I've used XV coconut oil for 2 years as part of my ketogenic diet for stove-top cooking and stir-frying. I also mix it into bone broth and soups. But suddenly it disappeared from the supermarket shelf, so I decided to try ordering this brand online. I'm glad I did. When the pan heats up, a delicate coconut scent fills my kitchen, so it's clearly very pure. When the veggies or eggs are cooked, they come out of the pan easily, with a lovely flavor in them. Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Essie W.

customer_reviews.title: Natural moisturizer for baby
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coconut oil! I got it for my newborn, I wanted to use a natural oil to moisturize his skin. It smells amazing. I also use it on his scalp before giving him a bath, it helps with the dandruf. I started using it on myself as well to moisturize my breast since it’s safe for breastfeeding. Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: HonestMomma

customer_reviews.title: Received it in very nice condition
customer_reviews.text: I was worried I would receive this with mold on it or bugs after seeing the rare 1 star reviews, but after fully inspecting it, it seems very fresh and high quality. When I apply it to my hair it doesn't have a bad acidic smell like other coconut oils I've used. As far as moisturizing my hair goes, I have to experiment with the amount of oil I use vs the amount of shampoo I use.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This sits on my bathroom counter and I apply it all over after my shower to moisturize my skin. It gives my skin a glow and I never feel or look flaky or dry even hours after applying it. The trick is to apply it just after you've dried off. I apply it all over, even my private areas front/back. I don't use it on my face though. When my hair feels dry I'll apply it to damp hair and leave it in for the day if I'm not going anywhere. Love this because it's cold-pressed so I receive the most benefit.
customer_reviews.author: LaVaun

customer_reviews.title: No more Itchy!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice product. I use it in the kitchen and as a moisturizer. The container is a good size, go through it quickly enough it doesn't go rancid and the wide mouth with straight sides is easy to work with. I find it particularly effective on dry itchy"winter skin". Apply SMALL amount wait ten minutes and...bam! no itchy 😛😎
customer_reviews.author: LeeW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I purchased this product because it had the perfect size to start testing the benefits of the coconut oil. The texture is more grainy than the one that I purchase from Costco (Kirkland) but great overall. It melts easier than the other ones so keep it in a fresh environment. I recommend it and I am satisfied with my purchase. Love the smell and flavor. I use it every week on my hair and I added on my coffee in the mornings. No complaints so far. Since I used coconut oil very often comparing price/ quality I think I will continue purchasing the one from Costco, but this one it is a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It has a nice, light coconut scent and goes on like silk. I was always saving $$ buying coconut oil in the store, but it would flake while i was putting it on. This has a lovely texture and is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa

customer_reviews.title: I use this for oil pulling for my teeth
customer_reviews.text: For oil pulling, you swish the coconut oil around your mouth in the morning, and this has worked excellently! This item is on my "restock" list, because it's that important to always have it. When you oil pull, your mouth feels so much cleaner and that feeling lasts. I also use this on my skin as a moisturizer when I want to smell sweet, and It can be used as a uh, natural personal moisturizer too. I haven't used it yet to cook, but that's because I'm not a big fan of coconuts. But as someone who doesn't like coconuts, this is totally bearable because its more of just a sweet oil than anything.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for dogs with tummy troubles!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought this for myself. However, the other day, I was googling suggestions for my dog's dry nose. Coconut oil came up. Turns out, my dogs go absolutely bananas for coconut oil! Some more googling turned up that coconut oil is totally safe for dogs and has many benefits. So I figured I'd start feeding them some for a while and see what happens. Well, this totally blew me away!!! Both my dogs are plagued by digestive issues, and this has completely resolved that issue. They have the best 💩 now of their life!!
customer_reviews.author: 🌟 Emma Elizabeth 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Helps alleviate dry scalp itch
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this on mostly my scalp so the review will be for its usage there. Ive cut my hair short since but when I had long hair, I developed very dry scalp. Using this help alleviate the itch and preventing dandruff/flakes from showing. It's not too shiny. Definitely not dull. It's in between. It also acts like a very light gel so after applying this to my scalp, I style my hair lightly for that messy look. Love the smell too!
customer_reviews.author: imlawrencehi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t provide a picture because the bottle I got is exact to the picture provided. I have tried using coconut oil By other companies but I don’t feel that they are as authentic. I use this product on my face (I have sensitive skin) and the skin on my face loves this product! I have bought it twice already and will guarantee that I will continue on buying it. Love this product for sure and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: yara

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my skin and put on my eyelashes and I love it! Love the smell it’s not strong of a smell but it’s light and is not too greasy as for you only apply lightly over the skin. I also use it to condition my hair over night works wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Liza R.

customer_reviews.title: My fave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it came in liquid form instead of a solid white & I know people are complaining about it but if you look at their answered questions they explain that it will melt in extreme heat but it doesn't mean it doesn't work. Have been using this on my curly hair & LOVEE it makes it so shiny/soft/frizz free, i tried on my face but I don't like the feel if it & IT SMELLS SOO GOODDD also, if you really want the white solid texture just put it in the fridge but not for too long :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to help my skin but it's working wonders on my dog as well.
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble finding lotions that don't upset my skin so, after realizing that other coconut products haven't bothered me, I decided to try this. After ordering, though, I found that it is actually one of the top products to use on dogs as well, and is safe (and healthy) to digest. Our dog, who has had serious skin issues for years, showed immediate progress once I started applying this to his skin. He seems to enjoy the taste, as well, and it's really nice to know that it won't hurt him when he licks it.
customer_reviews.author: 60 something

customer_reviews.title: Viva is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I can’t live without this. I have used this for more years than I can remember. I use it for my hair and my face. I do K beauty and this is the first step. I also use it for my skin. I rub it between my hands and put it where I need it. I also use it to give my hands and nails a nice nourishing massage. This is my go-to-to for anything staple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Container is cheap
customer_reviews.text: I love the coconut oil, I hate the container. It leaks very bad. I have this product in my daughters room on an even surface and every day that I come home, there is coconut oil all over her dresser. Its terrible and feels like Im wasting my money since most of the oil is going towards moisturizing her dresser. I had to put Bounty underneath it to soak up the oil. Still looking for a good container to transfer the oil into.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what happened?  I received LIQUID  like water in container that suppose to hold regular type
customer_reviews.text: i bought three of the white short jars and one of them is like water and stays liquid o matter the temperature. I understand the company produces both the regular type and a liquid oil but the containers are shown on online as differen,. The oil coconut is in a tall dark slender jar and the reguarr coconut is in the short white jar.Has anyone had this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Workswell is a great moisturizer especially for those who live in cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: I use the coconut oil to moisturize my face and I absolutely love it! I bought this because winter is coming up and my skin always gets terribly dry for the winter season! I've never actually tried cooking with the coconut oil but I have used it as a moisturizer and I have used it in my hair to moisturize my hair! Love the product have absolutely nothing bad to say and I would definitely recommend ordering this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ann & Sha Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve Already ordered about 4 of more of this oil. Actually works for loosing weight. Not just that but I also use it as a moisturizer after I come out of the shower while my pores are still open. Must try this as soon as you out of shower I do this with my towel wrapped around me. I’ve seen great results in my face and have noticed that my eyelashes have grown too.Everything I need in one jar!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it so far :)
customer_reviews.text: After I take a shower, I dry off and lather up before I put my clothes on. I'll kind of towel off my arms if they are exposed so I dont get anything greasy cuz the oil is slightly greasy. So far i have been using it for a few days and my skin feels good. One thing that sucks is that coconut oil turns solid when its below 76 degrees, so I have to really dig my fingers into it each time I go to get some. Other than that, the stuff is good! I also take 2000mg coconut oil capsules everyday too to really get that extra oomph!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hair Care
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely for use in my hair. I heard that coconut oil was good for repairing damaged hair, and I have seen the difference! I apply this as a hair mask all over my hair, in addition to applying castor oil to my roots, at least and hour before washing my hair. Sometimes I apply it the night before and leave it on overnight. I found this keeps my hair super soft and silky and helps repair my damaged ends to keep them soft and decrease split ends.
customer_reviews.author: Demi Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Never ending usages!
customer_reviews.text: This comes in handy all the time, for many different reasons. One day it's because of my eczema, a different day it's because I burnt my hand on a lawn mower and even tho it burns for a few moments after putting it on, it definitely promoted faster healing! I had surgery and used it on my surgical scar once it was completely healed to help the appearance as well as to help rub out any scar tissue that was bulking up (doctor recommended!) I have used it for hair masks, sunburn, dry skin, just to name a few. Never ended uses!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product unusable
customer_reviews.text: Box was open and contents were left in the street instead of mailbox where half of order still was!!! Coconut oil is liquid and I am afraid to use it! It’s been since June 16th and arrived today I got a run around every time I checked on delivery! Not impressed and will never order from them again
customer_reviews.author: Michael D'Alessio

customer_reviews.title: You have to try it to believe it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Starting using it as a moisturizer under my makeup. Makeup glides on. My skin feels like it did 30 years ago. I have always been a loyal Oil of Olay 7 user but it has gotten so expensive for so little product I thought I would give this a try. I am so glad I did. I never would have believed something so simple and inexpensive could work so well. Not to mention, you can use it for a million other things. Give it a try...what have you got to lose?
customer_reviews.author: ddaniels

customer_reviews.title: Used for moisturizer & hair
customer_reviews.text: One of the coconut oil brands that I like to use as a moisturizer and sometimes for my hair. The smell in this one doesn’t have a strong smell like the Costco brand which is why I like this one. This one has a light smell that smells good but not too strong. Keeps my skin healthy and alive. Rarely do I use lotion, this is my substitute for lotion. I also use this for my hair and leave it on for about 30 minutes to an hour. Rinse with shampoo and leaves my hair feeling soft and shiny afterwards. Has great benefits, can’t go wrong with this coconut oil brand!
customer_reviews.author: TheOnenOnly

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I started using this product it was just for massaging. Needless to say I swear by this now. I have been in the beauty business for 2 decades now and this product recently became my #1 go to for hair, skin and make-up remover. I have used to help heal scars and soothe irritation. I know I can also cook with this but haven't gone that route yet. I am sure I will come up with a recipe soon. This Organic Extra Virgin Unrefined coconut oil should have been on my list many years ago. Better late than never!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Mine leaked
customer_reviews.text: When I open the package the inside of the envelope was covered with coconut oil. I twisted off the top and it was secured. I don’t see a crack anywhere so not sure what spilled on the inside of my envelope. It was greasy and gross.
customer_reviews.author: It’s me

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 2 weeks now and I am in love with it. I use it for everything. After doing a daily conditioner, I use this in my hair and now my hair doesn't feel dry or oily. My skin is loving it too; too many products have too many extra chemicals and this is the best natural remedy I've used that keeps my skin hydrated. Even my tattoos look a bit more vibrant again which I love. People who say it doesn't work probably don't use it regularly enough. I now swear by it and will be buying it hopefully forever.
customer_reviews.author: Panarican

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy coconut oil with a metal foil seal
customer_reviews.text: The seal on this has metal in it and even if you think you got it all off, there will still be a bit stuck on. Then if you try to microwave the hardened oil to make it liquid, the metal seal explodes and now you have burned metal in your previously edible coconut oil. Oil sold in a glass jar does not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Schneeman

customer_reviews.title: Great organic coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Great organic coconut oil but was disappointed that it came in a plastic container. I let it sit outside for a couple of minutes until it was liquid then poured into a glass container.
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: My hair has never been softer!
customer_reviews.text: I heard that Coconut Oil could be used to deep condition your hair, so I decided to try it. I put some in my hair and left it in for the recommended time (1-2 hours) and then washed my hair to get it all out. My hair has never been so soft and I'm obsessed! I will definitely be using it again and be recommending it to my friends and family. I didn't really like the smell of the oil but that is just my personal opinion and could very well be different for somebody else.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil is great. I take a little each day. My blood tests have improved since I've starting using it. I also keep a separate jar to use on my dog when she chews on her feet because of allergy. I use it when I bake bread and for lots of other things. There are so many things to use coconut oil for. I couldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: No more grease for me
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine suggested i purchase this after i got my hair braided and nothing would stop it from itching. This has literally saved my hair life. It smells really good. It’s a solid but it turns to oil when applying it to your scalp. And the relief it gave my daughter and i was amazing. It also goes a long way better then grease does. I’ve had this for over a month and haven’t even gone thru half of it. It coats pretty well and it feels really good. I haven’t tried using it for its other uses but maybe I’ll try it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kialovespurple

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience, Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ended up refunding this product. My packing was broken and the product leaked, but that's mostly an issue with my mailman not the product. I ended up buying this in a local skin care store, and it works great in my hair. It keeps it smooth and styled without looking or feeling crusty like most hair gels do. If you trust who ships your goods then you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Darien Williams

customer_reviews.title: Clean, organic, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I've had contact dermatitis on my lower back and legs for years. A doctor told me to start using extra virgin organic coconut oil once or twice a day and it's all cleared up. When I have time, I'll put the plastic tub in hot water for a couple minutes so I can just pour the oil into my hands for application. When I don't have time, I can just scrape out a chunk and apply. This stuff is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: L. Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: The best body cream of ALL of them. I slather this on after a shower and it has disappeared by the time dress. My skin stays soft and non-itchy till the next shower. There's such a faint coconut aroma that it's gone in a few minutes, too. I even run my coconut-oil hands over my hair. Not too much! Unless you want to condition your hair, in which case you put a lot on, leave it for a while then shampoo. GREAT stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. GrayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best product.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product! This is the best product for your skin, ever!! I use it all over my body. I’m nearly 60 and I have smooth fresh looking skin before make-up. I use it on my face at night 15-20 before bed as it goes on oily. Each morning my face looks fresh and moisturized. It’s great for ashy rough heels and elbows and it has a quiet pleasant fragrance. I will never buy the overpriced wrinkle creams. I’m definitely a coconut oil customer for life. I don’t cook with it which is why I didn’t rate the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: LHGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just now finally getting the end of the jar. It didn't work super well for my skin, but my skin troubles have been so problematic as of late that even Eucerin doesn't work super well. For my hair however, it's bomb. I use it as a sealant and my hair is super soft. Also it smells divine of course, and melts in your hands just great.
customer_reviews.author: DA0726

customer_reviews.title: Good for hair!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because i have a dry scalp and dandruff and this has been helping me. i put it all over my hair and let it sit for a few hours or throughout the day and after washing my hair its really smooth.
customer_reviews.author: margarita

customer_reviews.title: but I have never liked coconut so this is no surprise
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this coconut oil for oil pulling for just over a week now and have already seen results. The swelling in my gums has gone down and my teeth are slightly whiter. I look forward to seeing more results with time. But this is not an oil pulling testimonial, more about the oil itself. It doesn't have a pleasant odor or taste to me, but I have never liked coconut so this is no surprise. In all, it does what I expected it to and I'm happy. It does not have the yellowing at the bottom that other posters have complained about.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieReviews

customer_reviews.title: Great on diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a last ditch effort for diaper rash after almost every cream stopped working. My little one was so irritated by diaper rash creams she would squirm when we applied them. When I put this on her she didn't cry or squirm! The next morning the rash was almost completely gone! I'm using this as a preventative now plus I can rub it on her arms and legs. I don't really like the scent of coconut but this is very light.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V.

customer_reviews.title: A product that does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Have blonde baliayage hair and it was feeling extremely dry. I cut the ends off, but it still felt dry and frizzy. I ordered this based on the reviews. I applied and kept it on my hair all day and washed it off before I went to bed. Left my hair to air dry. When I woke up the next morning my hair felt so much better. I put a little morroccan oil into my hair, brushed it through and was ready to go. It's now a week later and my hair still feels wonderful. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: grateful for reviews

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Although most people seem to use this for skin care purposes these days it seems, I use it to season and coat my cast iron skillets. People also use it for cooking; I don't because I am not convinced it is healthy. People also use it in keto-type diets. It really is an all purpose product, inexpensive, too. It has a very high smoke point so is useful for frying. It does impart a noticeable coconut flavor and aroma. I'm not a fan but many people like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost was low and it works for pulling. I haven’t used it for cooking.
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this to clean my teeth after reading about oil pulling. I use an inhaler every day that over time, turned my teeth brown. I used the coconut oil before I brushed every morning for about two weeks and my teeth are back to normal. Put about a tsp of oil in my mouth, swoosh it around teeth and hold it in for as long as I could, then spit it out. I recommend the oil pull using this to anyone who wants to whiten their teeth. It wasn’t hard to do and doesn’t taste bad either.
customer_reviews.author: cathouse

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cat Dermatitis & Immune Support - and People too
customer_reviews.text: I use this for skin, hair, and dietary support. I have also foud it to be extremely helpful in addressing cat dermatitis (resulting from flea bite allergy). We have 4 cats ranging in age from @ 8 to @ 17 years. 2 of them love the taste and will eat out of my hand. For the other 2, I just rub about 1/2 a teaspooon on a paw, and they will lick it off. I see positive change in their fur and skin within 24 hours! MUST continue for several days to enjoy full result.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gjeny

customer_reviews.title: Hate the smell but it is 100% coconut oil.
customer_reviews.text: Hate the smell but it is exactly what i ordered. I use it once a week for 2 hours on my hair and i have noticed my hair become more manageable. I just hate the smell of coconut now and forever and will probably never consume anything with coconut ever again. Seriously, i feel nauseous every time i use it. But if you like the smell of coconut, this is for you. (btw i did not even know i hated the smell of coconuts until i bought this)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Downs

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive issue resolved.
customer_reviews.text: I am a man and have researched a problem regarding dry nipples. Mine are large and highly sensitive but became painfully dry and cracked. I know this is An issue for both sexes. This product is amazing !!! I have tried everything including prescription creams with no results. After just 3 days applying this they are soft, smooth and pain free. Also has worked on red patches on my face from shaving. Try it !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SDLMDKAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use solution
customer_reviews.text: Use this coconut oil for just about everything! I have recently started to experiment with making my own body scrubs and this coconut oil is an amazing base. It doesn't leave a greasy feeling when you leave the shower, more like a silky sheen. After you dry off, it becomes like an all day lotion without feeling greasy. I also use it to remove my make-up and I have used it as a lotion alone for dry skin patches. I love the wide mouth on the jar making it easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: This product clarifies my skin like no other. I put it on for few minutes and then go into the shower. It really clarifies my face and smooths it out. It gives my skin some kind of radiance. Also, I like to put it on my skin around the roots of my hair when I color my hair. Later, when I wash my hair, the color stains on my face wash out smoothly without the rubbing and rubbing to get the color stains off my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sam W.

customer_reviews.title: A+ Cocounut Oil
customer_reviews.text: THIS = AMAZING. I love that it is organic. I use it for my skin; mainly my face. After I wash my face to take my makeup off, there is always some leftover makeup that did not wash off. I just take a cotton ball and swipe some coconut oil from the jar on it and use it to take whatever unseen leftover makeup is still on my face. It's amazing! Doing that has helped immensely with frequent breakouts that I was experiencing due to that left over makeup on at night. I am a big fan of this coconut oil and will definitely purchase again in the future when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I just got it and so far I really love it! I will do a update as I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and so far I really love it! I will do a update as I've seen reviews of people saying it molded. To avoid this, I'm keeping it in the fridge(this may or may not help but time will tell). Its affordable for how much you get and you don't have to use too much. I have dreadlocks and I love the way it makes my hair feel. Would recommend to anyone with natural hair, or any other hair types. Can be used for more than that, but that's not why I have it so I cant really elaborate on other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Yami Huey

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wouldnt do this but this stuff is great! Use on my hair for dry scalp and I couldn't believe how great it works. Verified Purchaser and will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome moisturizer. I bought this for dry, cracked skin and hands. Worked great! It comes in a more solid form, almost like lard. After a few seconds in my hands, it gets liquid. I’m guessing if stored in a warm area, it might be liquid all of the time?? I did not use this for cooking, so I do not know about the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

product_meta.title: Viva Naturals Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 16 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:CoconutDelicious and fragrant, coconut oil is one of the most useful foods you can keep in your pantry. Cold-pressed from the world’s best-quality organic coconuts, our extra-virgin organic coconut Oil is flavorful and aromatic, adding nutrient-rich flavor to your favorite foods and recipes. Whether you’re using it to cook, bake, or as a clean and natural moisturizer, Viva Naturals Organic extra-virgin coconut oil is the one product you’ll use every single day. Try it today – you’ll be glad you did.

MANUFACTURER'S NOTICE
An allergy to coconuts is rare; however, customers who are allergic to coconuts may experience contact allergic dermatitis to coconut products. Food allergies are due to the inability to digest proteins, such as gluten (found in wheat), casein (found in dairy), protein found in tree nuts, etc. Coconut protein is found in the meat of the coconut, not in the oil. This product contains 100% Extra Virgin Coconut Oil only. No other ingredients are present that would not be suitable for use or consumption

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
If you have any questions or concerns please feel free to contact us at customercare@vivanaturals.com or give us a call at 1-800-921-8482. Our helpful customer service team is available Monday through Friday from 9AM to 5PM EST.

See more
feature_bullets: MADE FROM FRESH, ORGANIC COCONUTS – Cold-pressed from fresh, organic coconuts, Viva Naturals Extra-Virgin Coconut Oil delivers rich flavor and aroma that’s nutrient rich and naturally delicious.

PERFECT FOR COOKING, FRYING & SPREADING - With a naturally high smoke point (350°F/177°C), coconut oil is perfect for baking, frying and sautéing. Spread it on muffins or toast for a delightful and delicious alternative to butter.

NUTRIENT-RICH SKIN & HAIR-CARE TREATMENT – Super useful outside the kitchen, coconut oil makes a luscious lotion or hair conditioner that provides deep, nutrient-rich hydration without feeling sticky or greasy.

EASILY FITS YOUR LIFESTYLE – Whether you’re following a keto, paleo or gluten-free lifestyle, or just looking for a tastier alternative to margarine or cooking oil, our Organic Coconut Oil is easy to use, and fits seamlessly into your day-to-day. No refrigeration required.

USDA-CERTIFIED ORGANIC & NON-GMO - Using only the world’s highest-quality organic coconuts, our Coconut Oil is USDA-Certified Organic, non-GMO, and gluten free, grown and harvested sustainably without the use of harmful chemicals, pesticides or other nastiness.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
